description: React component for the Summary page in a travel budget tracker application, displaying trip summary, expenses, and charts with export functionalities.

methods.name: SummaryPage()
methods.description: Main React component function rendering the trip summary page with calculations, charts, and export functions.

methods.name: exportCSV
methods.description: Generates and triggers download of the expenses data in CSV format.

methods.name: exportPDF
methods.description: Triggers the browser's print dialog to export the summary as a PDF.
